    • topK

      public CostOptimization.Builder topK(int topK)
      Sets the number of hot positions to probe per round (default 50).

      "Hot" positions are conditions ranked by reachProbability Ã— cost. These are conditions that are both frequently evaluated and expensive, making them the best candidates for reordering to reduce expected cost.

      Parameters:
      topK - number of hot positions to consider moving each round
      Returns:
      the builder
